message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $175, but I'm open to negotiation.
I really like the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $140.  This is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $130.
